attributes.additional_details:
The time has come for the public air their views with regards to protecting these offenders.
Pedophilier is a horrific crime & I strongly believe the offender does not deserve the right to protection from retribution.
Although victims are supported through various agencies undoubtably this professional support will sooner or later come to an end in which the victim then has to make the best of their life although the past is never far from their minds.
Offenders on the other hand for example are given help to change their identities so they can go about their daily life with out fear of retribution, this has to change!
